error.usernameInvalid: The username {{username}} is invalid. Please read the hints regarding allowed characters.
error.emailRegistered: There is already an account registered for {{email}}.
error.emailBlacklisted: We do not accept your email provider due to spam issues. Please choose a different one such as Gmail.
error.tokenInvalid: The token given in this URL is invalid. Please make sure your email client did not crop parts of the link.
error.tokenExpired: Your token expired. Please restart the registration and click on the activation link right away.
error.usernameReserved: The username {{username}} is currently reserved for its previous owner. The reservation expires in {{months}} months.

headers.registration.description: Creating a new account on faforever.com
headers.activation.description: Verify your data and choose a password
headers.steamLink.description: Validate your game license by logging in to Steam
headers.fafClientSetup.description: Guide to setup the FAF Client up to your first game

username.caption: Username
username.restrictions: Only a-z, A-Z, digits, minus and underscore are allowed. Must start with a letter. Minimum 3, maximum 16 characters
username.description: This is your login name as well as the name visible to other players. It can be changed over time.

email.caption: Email
email.description: We will send an activation email to this address. It's also used for password reset via email.
email.emailSent.details: We sent you an email. Please check your inbox and open the activation link in the mail.

precheck.whereBought: Where did you buy Supreme Commander: Forged Alliance?
precheck.operatingSystem: Which operating system do you use?

activation.emailWarning:
It seems like you did not come to this page using the activation link from your registration email.
As we miss relevant information from the activation url token, this step is disabled.
Please use the activation link in your registration email!
activation.expiredToken: Your token expired. Please restart the registration and click on the activation link right away.
activation.invalidToken: The token given in this URL is invalid. Please make sure your email client did not crop parts of the link.
activation.wrongDataHint: If username or email is wrong just restart the registration process.
activation.success.nextSteps: To login to the lobby and play a game, please proceed with linking your account to Steam. However, you can already login to the website and the forum.

steamLink.registrationRequired: You need an activated FAF account to perform this step.
steamLink.redirectHint: During the process we will redirect you to Steam, where you need to login with your Steam credentials. FAF has no access to your Steam credentials at any time.
steamLink.success.nextSteps: You can now login to the lobby server. The next step explains how to setup the FAF client.

fafClientSetup.download.unavailable: Github seems to be unavailable at the moment. Please refresh or try again later.
fafClientSetup.notSupported: Windows [32 bit] and MacOS are not supported.
fafClientSetup.install.faPresent: This guide assumes that you have installed Forged Alliance on Steam already!

forms.ownsSteam.accepted: I own Supreme Commander: Forged Alliance on Steam.
forms.tos.accepted: I have read and agree with our Terms of Service
forms.translationHint: Only the english version is legally binding. However, the community has created unofficial translations.
forms.privacyStatement.accepted: I have read and agree with our Privacy Statement
forms.recaptcha: To protect ourselves from bots, we need you to solve this captcha. Sorry.

registration.success.nextSteps: We send an email to {{email}}. Please click on the activation link in this email to proceed.
